title: Troll in Central Park
creator_credit: Warner Bros Pictures, Don Bluth Productions, Don Bluth, Gary Goldman and John Pomeroy
brief_description: Stanley is not your usual troll because he has a kind heart and a wonderful magical gift. His “green thumb” can create flowers at a touch. Wicked Queen Gnorga of the Trolls sends Stanley to New York where there is little green growing. He takes refuge in Central Park where he befriends Gus and Rosie. Unfortunately for the trio Queen Gnorga decides to spoil their fun and lets her mischief magic wreak havoc in the Big Apple. With the voices of Dom DeLuise, Cloris Leachman and Hayley Mills.
